response.overview: It seems like every group has its own series of secret signs to communicate and advertise among themselves. They gay community is no exception, we have our own secret set of silent signals to tell the others among us what we want, what we need, what we like, and what we love to do. The most common signal, is a hanky in the left or right pocket, and the choice of which side and what color can convey volumes about what turns this guy on. A WHITE HANKY on the right side means he's an expert at oral sex. And to prove it, this classic film from the steaming 80's has more hot mouths on hard dicks than you ever thought possible. It's a wall to wall suck-fest for the guys who know how to wear their hankies. BE CAREFUL HOW YOU DRESS!
response.title: White Hanky
